content: Congratulations to all our GSoC selections and thank you to everyone that applied! If you didn't get selected, I'd be glad to give you feedback (public or private, please specify) on your proposal. It was a competitive year and we simply couldn't accept everyone we wanted, but I hope you'll remain involved and active with BRL-CAD. Using BRL-CAD in your studies can be a great way to build experience, and help you make an even better proposal next year or get started on a project of your own. If you were selected, congratulations and let's get started! Your next step is turning those proposals into project plans. Here's a http://brlcad.org/wiki/Google_Summer_of_Code/Checklist

Thanks Sean!
Also, congratulations everyone! :D
Look forward to an amazing time ahead!

Thank you @Sean,
And yeah as @Jaipal Singh said Congrats to everyone who got selected :)

Also feel free to reach out to your mentors but remember to not communicate in private (e.g., via private e-mails) when talking about your project. Talk here or on IRC or on our mailing, but not in private! Also, it is the plan to shuffle a few mentors around, so stay tuned.
